DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Men woman 60 year age screening . Healthy determine investigator basis medical history , physical examination , clinical laboratory test result , vital sign , 12lead electrocardiogram ( ECG ) . Exclusion criterion : History drug abuse within 1 year study day 1 .
